'''Betsy Butterbur''' was a [[Bree-landers|woman]] of [[Bree]] who worked in the [[Prancing Pony Inn]]. Betsy Butterbur was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' film series]], where she was portrayed by [[Katie Jackson]].

== History ==
Betsy Butterbur was a relative of "[[Barliman Butterbur|Butterbur Snr]]", and worked as a barmaid at the Prancing Pony Inn. She waited on both [[Thorin]] and [[Gandalf]] when the two met in the inn.<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''</ref>
